[**Surfing Ocean Data in the Cloud**](https://podaac.jpl.nasa.gov/animations/Webinar_Surfing_Ocean_Data_in_the_Cloud_Beginners_Guide_PO.DAAC_NASA_Earthdata_Cloud) - The Beginner's Guide to PO.DAAC in the NASA Earthdata Cloud.

[**Moving Code to the Data: Analyzing Sea Level Rise Using Earth Data in the Cloud**](../external/July_2022_Earthdata_Webinar.ipynb) - A Jupyter Notebook walkthrough of a simple workflow from scratch to show how in-cloud analysis can be achieved with minimal knowledge of AWS cloud.
